discourse_list.title: Operational Support Final Weekly Update: May 20 - 27, 2021

content.content: General Updates This is the final update for Operational Support! Operational Support will be sunsetting this month. @amyjung will formally offboard as a facilitator and at Maker at large starting May 31st. @juan will be charging on as Facilitator of the SES Core Unit.  Know Your MIP:  None for this and next week. Anyone interested in presenting their MIP can reach out to @juan    Collateral Onboarding:  Nothing for now. Let us know if you have a project to present!    Core Units Updates: Follow developments of Core Units on  coreunit.makerdao.network  Past Calls    Core Unit Launch Pod Session: Prose11 - GovAlpha Facilitator    Core Unit Launch Pod Session: Collateral Onboarding Core Unit (Recording Coming Soon)   Calls Coming up  Core Unit Launch Pod Session: Oracles with @NikKunkel  - June 2nd!  Core Unit Launch Pod Session: Strategic Marcomms with @kathleen - TBD   New Core Unit Mandated!     Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit @juan, @wouter    Core Units in RFC   Oracles Core Unit @nikkunkel   Collateral Onboarding Core Unit @monkey.irish   Strategic Happiness Core Unit @aburban90   New GovAlpha Facilitator! @prose11   Strategic Marcomms Core Unit @kathleen  New Budgets for Risk, GovAlpha, and SES    In Case You Missed It     [Statistics] Estimated Yearly Revenue By Vault Class by @PaperImperium  Guide: Navigating Feedback from Governance and the Greater MakerDAO Community - by @amy.jung  Updates to our Forum MakerDAO People at a Glance Autonomous MakerDAO Working Group is Closed   Core Unit Office Hours are still ongoing  Help us identify Risk and Opportunities - by SES  MKR Compensation Guidelines - MIP53 - by @Planet_X   An alternative MKR Compensation Plan - by SES   Signed @amyjung @juan That’s really all for us
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
